name: Heal, Mass
target: One or more creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
text: This spell functions like heal, except as noted above. The maximum number of hit points restored to each creature is 250.
target_zh: 一个或更多生物，任意两者之间的距离不超过30尺
text_zh: 除了上文记述的内容之外，该法术的功能如同‘医疗术 (heal)’一般。每个生物可以恢复的HP至多为250点。
